metadata.title: Inteli - Technology and Leadership Courses
metadata.description: Explore Inteli's courses, where theory and practice come together to create innovative solutions in a collaborative environment with a strong connection to the job market.

content_blocks.text: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: Learn to manage business, finances and people in order to lead companies and digital transformation processes.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: You will learn about and apply technology concepts, such as AI and Blockchain, as well as studying financial market topics, entrepreneurship and leadership, creating projects for real companies in the market.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: Learn to design and integrate computer systems that combine hardware and software in an innovative way.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: You will take part in projects involving robot simulation and control, the development of autonomous vehicle prototypes, embedded systems, industrial automation and solutions for smart and connected cities. Design and manage software based on science, technique and ethics.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: You'll be involved in projects for cloud computing services, mobile applications, automation with voice commands, building software architectures, among others. Solve complex problems by applying computational techniques.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: Improve and create solutions based on algorithm design, combinatorial optimization, parallel computing, GPU programming, deep learning, computer vision, reinforcement learning, natural language processing (NLP) and generative artificial intelligence, etc. Create and implement computer systems for efficient business management.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: You'll work with information architecture and security, blockchain technology, natural language processing and much more.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: 4000 hours On-site and Full-time* Investment: (January 2026) * Part-time from the third year
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.

content_blocks.text: You learn while you do and leave university with a CV full of projects, not just grades.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
content_blocks.subsection: You learn while you do and leave university with a CV full of projects, not just grades.

content_blocks.text: "A world of possibilities opens up when you leave university with business and leadership skills and a portfolio of developed prototypes." Allan Casado Computer Science student
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
content_blocks.subsection: You learn while you do and leave university with a CV full of projects, not just grades.

content_blocks.text: "I've always believed that a leader in technology needs to blend technical knowledge with relationships with people. I hope that I'll be a successful professional in ten years' time and that I'll be able to balance my technical knowledge with soft skills, just as a leader should." Maria Luisa Vilaronga Information Systems student
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
content_blocks.subsection: You learn while you do and leave university with a CV full of projects, not just grades.

content_blocks.text: "During my internship, I realized that business knowledge was key to a truly enriching experience. They gave me a broader view of how companies operate and how decisions are made, allowing me to better understand the organization's challenges and objectives." Julia Rodrigues Togni Software Engineering student.
content_blocks.section: A technology college with the most innovative method in the world: hands-on.
content_blocks.subsection: You learn while you do and leave university with a CV full of projects, not just grades.
